Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We need to produce a BPMN-like textual process model based on these interview excerpts. Should include activities, sequence flow, gateways, roles, artifacts, exceptions/variations, and note uncertainties. Provide clear structured textual representation that could be turned into diagram.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: So output should be textual description of process, like using BPMN elements: Start Event -> Tasks, Exclusive Gateway, etc.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Include participants: Purchase Dept, Accounts Payable Clerk (Mary), Purchasing Officer (Dan), Department Manager (Carlos), Accounts Payable Supervisor (Rita), Supplier Relationship Manager (Karen). Artifacts: Invoice, Purchase Order (PO), Confirmation, Approval, etc. Also include inputs/outputs.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: We should consolidate contradictory accounts: Maybe differences about who triggers manager approval, who can approve, handling of missing PO, etc. Indicate uncertainty where needed.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: We should produce a step-by-step textual BPMN model. Could use notation like: [Start] -> (Receive Invoice) -> Exclusive Gateway (PO present?) -> (Check PO) -> (Log Invoice) -> (Forward to Purchasing) -> (Confirm Receipt) -> Exclusive Gateway (Match PO?) -> ... etc.
